name: The Andromeda Mysteries
summary: Solve a mystery of a ring of spies, or a stolen alien artifacts. Play on an asteroid or at the edge of a black hole. This sci-fi whodunnit lets you chat naturally with AI-generated characters to discover the culprit of the mystery. Driven by ChatGPT, this mystery game gives you a new scenario and characters every time you play! Rank up as a detective to gain new characteristics of locations and suspects. Chat naturally with the characters as you hunt for clues. Even the artwork for each character is custom created by AI.
